title: Small boat safety
brief_description: The objective of this film is to increase recognition of small boat and pleasure craft hazards and to demonstrate sound safety practice to boating, water skiing, youth and community groups.
description: The objective of this film is to increase recognition of small boat and pleasure craft hazards and to demonstrate sound safety practice to boating, water skiing, youth and community groups.
